        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

#Making bar-plot for states with top confirmed cases
sns.set(rc={'figure.figsize':(15,10)})
sns.barplot(x="State",y="Total_Confirmed_cases",data=top_states_confirmed,hue="State")
plt.show()
